titles: A proper new balad of the Bryber Gehesie Taken out of the fourth booke of Kinges the .v. chapter. To the tune of Kynge Salomon.
author: Mell, George.
publisher: in fletestreate beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. John Evangelist by Thomas Colwell,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
